Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Good news. Bucks run is up and running with excellent skate and classic. The golf course was also regroomed, but still no classic tracks there. Very windy so there is lots of debris in the tracks. Skaters reported excellent conditions. Note that on Monday and Tuesday Bucks will not be open until 2:00 so more snow can be spread. Please respect this closure so that we do not create conflict with the park staff. There’s still lots of other areas at the park to ski.

Stoney Creek Metropark (Shelby Township).conditions: [ ] groomed[ ] golf course is about as good as it gets[ ] Sheldon trails - fair to  good littered with tree parts, though the usual being trod upon[ ] icy patches under trees where not enough snow made it to the groun)d as it got colder and the rain - wet snow turned to ( oops - repost -- rain >>> snow

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Lots of snow ! Yesterday’s big groomer provided a firm flat skate deck . Today nature provided about 2 inches of fluff . Has to push a little bit , but it was very nice - and the sun came out . LF 7

nubsNob.xcTrails: Groomed and tracked. Conditions are very good.
nubsNob.comments: It's a cold start to the ski day but the wind is light and the temperature is forecast to rise quickly today with a high around 24 degrees. A few inches of snow fell at Nub's this morning. Expect some light snow sitting on top of the corduroy which should make for great skiing. NASTAR racing today from 12:30 to 2:30 p.m. on Birch Run. The soups of the day is cream of potato and ham. Over 40 runs are now open at Nub's! Pintail Peak will open before next weekend! Make it a great day at Nub's Nob!
